summary: I simply felt a conjured undead  warrior should be slightly larger, so i made him 20% larger and changed nothing else.
descriptionHtml:
* THIS MOD ONLY CHANGES THE SIZE FROM THE STANDARD 1 TO 1.2*




I simply felt a conjured undead warrior should be slightly larger, so i made him 20% larger and changed nothing else.He may have some trouble with doorways but you can just summon him on the other sides of doors anyway, so it shouldn't even be a problem.

Also i recommend u download balanced magic and the Dawnguard patch for it, as that is a wonderful mod.
author: Twiztedice11
